name: custom_demographics_read
description: Retrieve an existing custom demographics field

$ul: **allowed_values**: Allowed values if needed. Values must be separated by comma `,`
**archived**: Indicates that the object has been soft-deleted, and should not be used

**template_name**: Custom Patient Demographics with `template_name` set can be inserted into clinical notes via Form Builder. Only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers (0-9) or underscore(_) are allowed for template name.
